name: AdjointNonlinearRayTracing
postCreateCommand:
/bin/bash -lc ' \
    git config --global --add safe.directory "*" && \
    git submodule sync --recursive && \
    git submodule update --init --recursive --jobs 8 && \
    mkdir -p build && cd build && \
    cmake .. -G Ninja -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release \
      -DENOKI_CUDA=1 -DENOKI_AUTODIFF=1 -DENOKI_PYTHON=1 \
      -DCMAKE_CUDA_COMPILER=$CUDACXX \
      -DPYTHON_EXECUTABLE:FILEPATH=$(which python) && \
    cmake --build . -j $(nproc) && \
    cd .. && \
    echo "DRRT_DIR=\$(builtin pwd)"                              >  setpath.sh && \
    echo "ENOKI_DIR=\"\$DRRT_DIR/build/ext/enoki\""          >> setpath.sh && \
    echo "export PYTHONPATH=\"\$ENOKI_DIR:\$DRRT_DIR/build:\$DRRT_DIR/build/lib:\$PYTHONPATH\"" >> setpath.sh && \
    echo "export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=\"\$ENOKI_DIR:\$DRRT_DIR/build:\$DRRT_DIR/build/lib:\$LD_LIBRARY_PATH\"" >> setpath.sh && \
    echo "source \$(pwd)/setpath.sh" >> ~/.bashrc \
  '
